title: Option Set
intro: A set of DHCP options grouped for common configurations.

items.name: Default Router
items.description: Specifies the default gateway for clients.

items.name: DNS Basic
items.description: Assigns DNS server and domain search suffix.

items.name: NTP Servers
items.description: Provides Network Time Protocol server addresses.

items.name: VoIP Phone Config
items.description: Options typically used for VoIP phone provisioning.

items.name: WPAD Auto Proxy
items.description: Specifies URL for Web Proxy Auto Discovery.

items.name: VPN Profile
items.description: Provides custom options used by VPN clients (e.g., DNS split, routing hints).

items.name: Guest Isolation
items.description: Restricts DHCP lease to non-routable guests (e.g., DNS only).

items.name: Blank Template
items.description: No options defined. Start from scratch.
